content: **knitted pot holders in drops cotton light the piece is worked with a multi-coloured pattern of fungus and berries theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern cluster-135 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** 17 x 17 cm **yarn** drops cotton light from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100 g colour 21 light beige 50 g colour 01 off white 50 g colour 11 apple green 50 g colour 12 green khaki 50 g colour 32 red 1 pot holder weighs approx 53 g **needles** drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
